projects.title: LaundryMate Website
projects.shortDescription: Developed a website in ReactJs. Entire solution consists well created reusable components and is written in BEM standards.
projects.description:
One among two developers who designed and developed LaundryMate website.

Translated designer mockups and wireframes into front end code using ReactJs, HTML, CSS and Bootstrap.

Involved in complete SDLC

Requirement Analysis, Development, System and Integration Testing.

Created reusable components to make the development process easier.

Entire code is written in BEM standards.

Used CSS preprocessor SASS to modularize the code by using variables, nesting, mixins and other features.

Handled cross browser/platform compatibility issues (IE, Firefox, and Safari).

projects.title: Giphy add-on
projects.shortDescription: Created Giphy add-on for XenForo(CMS) using GIPHY API which displays results in carousel view for providing best User Experience.
projects.description:
Created Giphy add‐ons for XenForo which makes call to GIPHY API and returns the requested gifs using PHP, JavaScript and API services.

Worked with WEBAPI's to make calls to thewebservices using URLs, which would perform GET,PUT,POST and DELETE operations on the server.

Involved in complete SDLC ‐ Requirement Analysis, Development, System and Integration Testing.

The results are displayed in a responsive carousel view, adding 5 results in queue when the user clicks Next button.

projects.title: Student Portfolio
projects.shortDescription: Developed a responsive student portfolio to display skills in ReactJs with following User Experience principles and providing clean User Interface.
projects.description:
Created portfolio using ReactJs, Bootstrap 4, HTML5, CSS3 and also used several npm packages for providing clean UI.

Designed vector logo using CorelDraw X8 and used Fireworks for generating graphics with good quality and less size for fast loading.

Entire projects data is displayed from a JSON file. This makes adding new projects to website easy.

Designed and developed in a way that beginners can use it as a template.
